code: import io from'socket.io-client';const serverUrl=window.location.hostname==='localhost'?'http://localhost:'+process.env.REACT_APP_PORT:'http://'+process.env.REACT_APP_SERVER_URL+':'+process.env.REACT_APP_PORT;const SERVER_URL=serverUrl;let socket;const getSocket=()=>{if(!socket){socket=io(SERVER_URL);return socket;}return socket;};export default getSocket;
